Back to Sergei Rachmaninoff

Sergei Rachmaninoff

Prélude, Gavotte and Gigue from the Violin Partita in E major (Johann Sebastian Bach)

1933 · Threlfall and Norris III/1

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 7' 30"

  • 1. Prélude
  • 2. Gavotte
  • 3. Gigue

This is an arrangement of the first, third and sixth movements of Johann Sebastian Bach’s partita no. 3 for solo violin (BWV 1006). Bach also arranged the partita for lute-harpsichord or harpsichord, and made orchestrations of the prélude for the sinfonias to the cantatas Wir danken dir, Gott, wir danken dir (BWV 29) and Herr, Gott, Beherrscher aller Dinge (BWV 120a).

1. Prélude

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 4

2. Gavotte

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

3. Gigue

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
